trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles a cancelable event.
trans-unit.target: 代表會處理可取消事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The LoginCancelEventHandler class represents the method that handles the cancelable events, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn> event, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatingUser> event.
trans-unit.target: LoginCancelEventHandler 類別代表的方法可處理的可取消事件，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn>事件，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatingUser>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatingUser> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn>

trans-unit.source: When you create a LoginCancelEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 LoginCancelEventHandler 委派時，您可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
